example.source:
<a:chart width="500" height="400">
                <a:axis mode="2D" x1="-1" y1="-0.2" x2="15" y2="1.1">
                    <a:style type="text/chartcss">
                        plane{
                            fill   : white;
                            stroke : #ebebeb;
                        };
                        tiles{
                            fill   : white;
                            stroke : #ebebeb;
                        };
                    </a:style>
                    <a:graph 
                      mode      = "bar" 
                      dataslice = "1X"
                      series    = "0.1#a 0.4#b 0.3#c 0.7#d 0.1#a 0.6#b 0.2#c 0.6#d 0.5#a 0.9#b 1#c 0.9#d">
                        <a:style type="text/chartcss">
                            graph.a{fill:#c4df9b}
                            graph.b{fill:#acd373}
                            graph.c{fill:#8dc63f}
                            graph.d{fill:#598527}
                            graph{
                                fill      : #fff200;
                                notransit : 0.5;
                                stroke    : #406618;
                            }
                        </a:style>
                    </a:graph>
                </a:axis>
            </a:chart>

<a:chart width="500" height="400">
                <a:axis 
                  mode  = "2D"
                  x1    = "-1" 
                  x2    = "15" 
                  y1    = "-1" 
                  y2    = "9">
                    <a:style type="text/chartcss">
                        plane {
                            fill   : #f8f8f8;
                            stroke : #f8f8f8;
                        };
                        tiles {
                            fill   : #f8f8f8;
                            stroke : #f8f8f8;
                        };
                    </a:style>
                    <a:graph 
                      mode      = "bar" 
                      dataslice = "1X"
                      series    = "1#a 0#b 2#c 0#d 3#e 0#a 8#b 0#c 5#d 0#e 2#c">
                        <a:style type="text/chartcss">
                            graph.a{fill:#18abf1}
                            graph.b{fill:#3ab3ea}
                            graph.c{fill:#52bcec}
                            graph.d{fill:#6ac6ef}
                            graph.e{fill:#5dc3f1}
                            graph{
                                fill      : white;
                                notransit : 0.5;
                                stroke    : #00aeef;
                                weight    : 2;
                            }
                        </a:style>
                    </a:graph>
                </a:axis>
            </a:chart>
